name: MindfulSpace
description: MindfulSpace is a mental health companion mobile application which is designed to help people identify, manage, check-in with their emotions on a daily basis, to help them understand themselves better and process their emotions in a much better way. By integrating Google Gemini API for empathetic analysis and Natural Language Processing (NLP) for crisis detection, the app provides a safe, intelligent, and personalized space for users to navigate their emotional journeys.
